original_text: Jeremiah then returned from Topheth, where the Lord had sent him to prophesy, and stood in the court of the Lord’s temple and said to all the people,
korean_text: 예레미야가 여호와께서 자기를 보내사 예언하게 하신 도벳에서 돌아와 여호와의 집 뜰에 서서 모든 백성에게 말하되

sentences.original_text: where the Lord had sent him to prophesy,
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 그를 보내어 예언하게 하신 그곳에서,

sentences.original_text: and stood in the court of the Lord's temple
and said to all the people,
